org.springframework.cloud.sleuth.zipkin

Class ZipkinAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.sleuth.zipkin.ZipkinAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @EnableConfigurationProperties(value={ZipkinProperties.class,org.springframework.cloud.sleuth.sampler.SamplerProperties.class})
 @ConditionalOnProperty(value="spring.zipkin.enabled",
                       matchIfMissing=true)
public class ZipkinAutoConfiguration
extends Object
    Auto-configuration enables reporting to Zipkin via HTTP. Has a default Sampler set as PercentageBasedSampler. The ZipkinRestTemplateCustomizer allows you to customize the RestTemplate that is used to send Spans to Zipkin. Its default implementation - DefaultZipkinRestTemplateCustomizer adds the GZip compression.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Spencer Gibb
    See Also:
    PercentageBasedSampler, ZipkinRestTemplateCustomizer, DefaultZipkinRestTemplateCustomizer
